Pusher (https://pusher.com/) London (Shoreditch) Full Time

Mobile Product Engineer: You will be part of a new team in Engineering who will be improving on the features of our current product and developing new ones to go alongside it.

By building applications and using our APIs, you will help us solve more problems for mobile developers who use our product. You will influence how our APIs are designed, and work with our platform engineers to bring them to life.

You will also take ownership of our Android and iOS libraries, and develop them further.

Send CVs to tom@pusher.com For a full description visit https://pusher.workable.com/jobs/114508
